languages.text: "Кто-то должен дойти до рычага и повернуть его, так? Выдвигаю кандидатуру нашей святой сестры! Страждущего духовной чистоты не должна пугать обычная грязь".
"Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."
languages.original_text: "Кто-то должен дойти до рычага и повернуть его, так? Выдвигаю кандидатуру нашей святой сестры! Страждущего духовной чистоты не должна пугать обычная грязь".

traits.locale_text: "Someone's gotta go to the lever and pull it, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A struggler seeking spiritual purity must not be deterred by common filth."
"Someone's gotta go to the lever and pull it, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A struggler seeking spiritual purity must not be deterred by common filth."
"Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."
"Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."
"Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

languages.text: “总得有人去拉拉杆，没错吧？我提议让我们圣洁的修女去做这件事情！毕竟对追求精神纯洁的人而言，这种不值一提的烂泥肯定挡不住他们。”
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: “总得有人去拉拉杆，没错吧？我提议让我们圣洁的修女去做这件事情！毕竟对追求精神纯洁的人而言，这种不值一提的烂泥肯定挡不住他们。”

languages.text: «Alguien tiene que ir a tirar de la palanca, ¿no? ¡Sugiero que vaya la santa hermana! Alguien que busca la pureza espiritual no se molestará por un poco de mugre terrenal, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: «Alguien tiene que ir a tirar de la palanca, ¿no? ¡Sugiero que vaya la santa hermana! Alguien que busca la pureza espiritual no se molestará por un poco de mugre terrenal, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「誰かがあのレバーを引きに行かないといけないんでしょ？なら聖なる修道女様を推薦するわ！精神的な純潔さを求める人なら、泥水を少しくらい浴びても平気であるべきだもの」
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: 「誰かがあのレバーを引きに行かないといけないんでしょ？なら聖なる修道女様を推薦するわ！精神的な純潔さを求める人なら、泥水を少しくらい浴びても平気であるべきだもの」

languages.text: "Jemand muss gehen und am Hebel ziehen, richtig? Ich schlage unsere heilige Schwester als Kandidatin vor! Wer spirituelle Reinheit sucht, wird doch nicht vor ein bisschen normalem Dreck zurückschrecken, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Jemand muss gehen und am Hebel ziehen, richtig? Ich schlage unsere heilige Schwester als Kandidatin vor! Wer spirituelle Reinheit sucht, wird doch nicht vor ein bisschen normalem Dreck zurückschrecken, oder?"

languages.text: « Quelqu'un doit aller tirer le levier, hein ? Je suggère d'envoyer notre sainte sœur ! Après tout, quelqu'un qui recherche la pureté spirituelle ne devrait avoir aucun problème à nager dans un peu de gadoue. »
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: « Quelqu'un doit aller tirer le levier, hein ? Je suggère d'envoyer notre sainte sœur ! Après tout, quelqu'un qui recherche la pureté spirituelle ne devrait avoir aucun problème à nager dans un peu de gadoue. »

languages.text: "Birimizin buraya girip kolu çekmesi lazım, değil mi? Benim oyum kutsal rahibeden yana! Ruhani saflığın peşinde koşan biri, azıcık çamurdan iğrenecek değil ya."
languages.original_text: "Someone's gotta go and pull the lever, right? I propose our holy sister as a candidate! A seeker after spiritual purity shouldn't be put off by a little bit of ordinary muck, after all."

traits.locale_text: "Birimizin buraya girip kolu çekmesi lazım, değil mi? Kutsal rahibeyi aday olarak ileri sürüyorum! Ruhani saflığın peşinde koşan biri, azıcık pislikten iğrenmez herhâlde."
